channel.title: Need some simple help

item.title: Need some simple help
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Yorchi elite:

No im gona make rubber chiken work nub…

How are you a senior member?

Your obviously retarded.

Use this code:

if((AttackingOn2.combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel || combatLevel + wildyLevel < AttackingOn2.combatLevel) && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != ####){ sM("Your level difference is too great!"); sM("You need to move deeper into the Wilderness."); faceNPC(32768 + AttackingOn); break; }

Change the itemid to yours.

And don’t ever call Runespace a nub, he is a far greater programmer than you, he taught me some very important things I didn’t know about programming. And the fact that you don’t know how to do this and in your signature you call “Coding”, “Codeing” Just makes you look like more of an idiot.

[quote=“Mr. Bobby, post:4, topic:379086”]i guess u could try SOMETHING like this, idk servers very well cus i quit them but here

if((AttackingOn2.combatLevel + AttackingOn2.wildyLevel <= combatLevel WeaponID != ####|| combatLevel + wildyLevel <= AttackingOn2.combatLevel && WeaponID != ####)){ sM("Your level difference is too great!");AttackingOn = 0; sM("You need to move deeper into the Wilderness."); faceNPC(32768 + AttackingOn); break; }

notice the

WeaponID != ####

change “WeaponID” to however player weapons are called in your server and the “#### to whatever the item u mades ID is”[/quote]

That would not work, but it would simply ruin the wilderness level unless you had a rubber chicken.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

i guess u could try SOMETHING like this, idk servers very well cus i quit them but here

notice the

WeaponID != ####

change “WeaponID” to however player weapons are called in your server and the “#### to whatever the item u mades ID is”

item.title: Need some simple help
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Hey, i madet a weapon that attack other players, but i cant attack them is says:

Your level difference is too great!
You need to move deeper into the Wilderness.

but i tryed add else and if but don’t helps, i how do it make if your wearing a weapon you can attack ?

if((AttackingOn2.combatLevel + AttackingOn2.wildyLevel <= combatLevel || combatLevel + wildyLevel <= AttackingOn2.combatLevel)){ sM("Your level difference is too great!"); AttackingOn = 0; sM("You need to move deeper into the Wilderness."); faceNPC(32768 + AttackingOn); break; }

Read full topic
